entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: string.ConstantEmpty #60508
  • Optimization opportunity for non-embeddable constants access in compiled Linq.Expressions #60506

Closed

  • [JIT]: Codegen for manual devirtualization #60492
  • `DateTime.Now` on Linux has wrong timezone #60469
    7.0.0
  • library_mono.js triggers apparent false-positive report from GitHub's codeql scan #59147
    6.0.0
  • API Named SetupDiEnumDeviceInterfaces Of setupapi.dll Error At .net core platform #59787
  • JsonCamelCaseNamingPolicy weird behavior #38437
    Future
  • Bug about JsonNode.Deserialize with unicode #60470

PullRequests

Created

  • Code optimization (and possibly coverage optimization) for System.Text.Json #60509
    area-System.Text.Json
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Properly type primary selectors in `fgMemoryVNForLoopSideEffects` #60505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] encapsulate emscripten js runtime #60504
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Reflection Invoke share more coreclr/mono #60270
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix for Ctor_Brush_Width test on Non-English Windows #60502
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [wasm] string interpolation instead of concatenation #60490
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [hackathon] Implement CreateSpan<T> intrinsic. #60498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Update IntelliSense package #60488
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix Int32 overflow bug in buffering logic #60460
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO
  • fix rid processing on macOS #60494
    area-Host
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Don't emit OVERFLOW and DIVIDED-BY-ZERO for "X div CNS" #60493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add documentation on how VN numbers memory #60476
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Allow interp->jit transitions for generic methods. #60461
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][llvmonly] Optimize virtual calls/rgctx fetches in gsharedvt methods. #60491
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [WASM] Adding a new switch to run wasm on NodeJS #54640
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change Brotli Optimal CompressionLevel value #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Donot review ]Wasm tests #60482
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Experiment with Roslyn optimization for ROS<T> in assembly data section #60327
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Constant string field data is duplicated when accessed from the same assembly #57185
  • Method group is not classified as "method name" when assigned to Delegate #57184

Closed

  • csc failed while building (Span<T> element comparing) #57148
    17.1
  • Regression - nullable suppression doesn't fix nullability exhaustiveness warnings in switches over tuple expressions #51904
    17.1
  • Nullability warnings should be removed if checked in linq expressions #33473
    Compiler.Next

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57182
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Fix DAG crash with removable numerical test following type test #57173
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Honor suppression on tuple element in switch #57118
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Next
  • Add TypeScript External Access API for document highlighting, signature help #57168
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure we don't throw when we filter an incomplete list to be empty #57160
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57183
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #57186
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Completion options4 #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update to ICSharpCode.Decompiler 7.1.0.6543 #53304
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 6, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-114719-.NET6 #37620
  • Visual Studio Blazor: Error list is wrong #37619
  • async void OnGet works perfectly on Windows but intermittent response on Oracle Linux #37618
  • Changing DI instance value in Middleware is not being reflected at other places, where DI of same type is used #37617
  • UseAuthorizationAnalyzer should flag WebApplication that calls UseRouting() #37616
  • Startup regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_dapper #37615
  • Perf regression: json #37614
  • Perf improvement: mvc #37613
  • Injection dependency on lambda expression fails. #37612
  • blazor - Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/utils/lock-free-alloc.c:145, condition `sb_header' not met, function:alloc_sb, Failed to allocate memory for the lock free allocator #37611
  • Blazor AOT compilation fails at ComputeBlazorPublishAssets.GroupExistingStaticWebAssets #37610
  • [Blazor rc1 & rc2] 'System.InvalidOperationException' in Microsoft.JSInterop.dll or 'Microsoft.JSInterop.JSDisconnectedException' in Microsoft.JSInterop.dll #37609
  • Permit to validate only selected objects binded with [BindProperty] for use with different forms in a single RazorPage #37606

Closed

  • Update readmes to indicate the correct node JS version to use #37456
  • Startup regression: json #37597
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #37579
  • IIS ClientDisconnectStress throws NullReferenceException on Windows 7 #26839
    Backlog
  • [SignalR] Initial ping is not guarded with connection lock #37340
    7.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix templates with Windows auth option #37607
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [Doc] Update readme files to the correct nodejs version #37605
    community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix #37340 by guarding the initial ping for SignalR #37414
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Cherry-pick #37414 to [release/6.0] for #37340 #37417
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't start the .NET webassembly app inside the auth iframe. Fixes #37355 #37524
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Enable helix retry for a small set of tests #37137
    area-infrastructure
  • Reenable test #37594
    area-runtime
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #37542
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
